text: WLWD may refer to: *WLWD-LD (channel 20), a low-power television station licensed to serve Springfield, Ohio, United States, which serves as a repeater of the Daystar network *WDTN (channel 2), a television station licensed to serve Dayton, Ohio, United States which formerly held the WLWD callsign *WBKS (93.9 FM), a radio station licensed to serve Columbus Grove, Ohio, United States which formerly held the WLWD callsign
title: WLWD
